Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were maintained in DMEM media supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing Y1699C mutant showed no significant protection against H2O2-induced cell death compared to wild-type LRRK2.
Cells expressing G2019S mutant showed no significant protection against H2O2-induced cell death compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Biological replicates.Description: All values in the figures were calculated from at least 2-3 independent experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment containing at least 6-8 replicates in each experimental condition.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for protection against H2O2-induced cell death.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with parental vector pCDNA3.1 were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and post hoc Fisher's protected least significant difference (PLSD) tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 70% compared to untreated control cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% compared to untreated control cells after H2O2 treatment.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were maintained in DMEM media supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing Y1699C mutant showed increased necrotic cell death under H2O2 stress compared to wild-type LRRK2.
Cells expressing G2019S mutant showed increased necrotic cell death under H2O2 stress compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with multiple independent replicates.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for lower necrotic cell death.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with parental vector pCDNA3.1 were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and post hoc Fisher's protected least significant difference (PLSD) tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Necrotic cell death less than 10% under H2O2 treatment.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Necrotic cell death greater than 20% under H2O2 treatment.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were maintained in DMEM media supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing Y1699C mutant showed decreased pERK levels under H2O2 stress compared to wild-type LRRK2.
Cells expressing G2019S mutant showed decreased pERK levels under H2O2 stress compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for pERK activation.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with parental vector pCDNA3.1 were used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Increased pERK levels under H2O2 stress compared to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No significant increase in pERK levels under H2O2 stress compared to control.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were maintained in DMEM media supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing Y1699C mutant showed decreased cell survival under H2O2 stress compared to wild-type LRRK2.
Cells expressing G2019S mutant showed decreased cell survival under H2O2 stress compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent frames of the cells were captured for each treatment condition.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for higher cell survival.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with parental vector pCDNA3.1 were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and post hoc Fisher's protected least significant difference (PLSD) tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell survival greater than 70% compared to untreated control cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell survival less than 50% compared to untreated control cells after H2O2 treatment.
